sentences.english: Snow goose feather the field to "wash" of again, like Caesar, like the fertilizer.

sentences.english: Now we product different levels goose feather badminton, duck feather badminton and Nylon badminton.

sentences.english: The snow was falling. Big flakes drifted with the wind like feathers.
